name: Aconcagua Ventures
overview: Aconcagua Ventures is no longer investing. It is venture capital firm specializing in early-stage investments. The firm seeks to invest in hi-tech companies with a focus on sectors such as software, Internet, communications and medical devices. It prefers to invest in Argentina and Latin America. The firm seeks to exit its investments preferably after five years, by realizing them in either the U.S. markets or any other major international market, following either a merger and acquisitions route or an IPO. Aconcagua Ventures is based in Buenos Aires, Argentina.
